To keep the foundational model

to retrieval augmented
generation, a technique

that involves fetching data
from company data sources,
and enriching the prompt with that data

accurate responses.
Knowledge bases for Amazon Bedrock is

a fully managed RAG
capability that allows you
to customize foundational models responses
with contextual and relevant company data.

Knowledge bases for
Amazon Bedrock automates

the end-to-end RAG workflow,
including ingestion,
retrieval, and prompt augmentation,

eliminating the need for
you to write custom code

to integrate data sources
and manage queries.
